text:
Say yes to the #vaccine. 👍🏽👍🏾👍🏼👍
If you are the primary carer for an elderly or disabled person who is clinically vulnerable to #COVID19  this is known as being an #unpaidcarer.

Book your #vaccine on 020 8825 8000 or 0203 137 6194.
